plot: If Rafael takes gang members up on their offer to lend him money for his mother's birthday present, he risks being folded into the The Shadow by the a being known as La Cabra (The Goatman).
title: La cabra
plot_es: If Rafael takes gang members up on their offer to lend him money for his mother's birthday present, he risks being folded into the The Shadow by the a being known as La Cabra (The Goatman).
plot_en: If Rafael takes gang members up on their offer to lend him money for his mother's birthday present, he risks being folded into the The Shadow by the a being known as La Cabra (The Goatman).
